TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit JavascriptCallbackBehaviorAttribute extends System.Attribute implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior
Public NotInheritable Class JavascriptCallbackBehaviorAttribute Inherits Attribute Implements IContractBehavior
public ref class JavascriptCallbackBehaviorAttribute sealed : Attribute, System::ServiceModel::Description::IContractBehavior
type JavascriptCallbackBehaviorAttribute = class inherit Attribute interface IContractBehavior

summary.span: 一種合約行為，允許將 URL 查詢字串參數名稱設定為除了預設的 "callback" 以外的名稱。

span.span: A contract behavior that allows you to set the URL query string parameter name to something other than the default "callback".

remarks.format: ## Remarks JSONP 是一種啟用 Web 瀏覽器跨網站指令碼支援的機制。JSONP is a mechanism used to enable cross-site, scripting support in Web browsers. 這需要傳送具有回呼函式名稱的要求，以 URL 查詢字串參數值的方式提供該名稱。It involves sending a request with a callback function name provided as a URL query string parameter value. 服務會傳回回應，將一般的 JSON 裝載包裝在對於提供回呼函式的呼叫中，就像一行可執行程式碼一樣。The service returns a response with the usual JSON payload wrapped in the call to the provided callback function as if it were a line of executable code. 以下是用來呼叫服務的 URL 範例：`http://baseAddress/Service/RESTService?callback=functionName`。The following is an example of a URL used to call a service: `http://baseAddress/Service/RESTService?callback=functionName`. 叫用服務時，服務會產生下列 JSON 回應。When invoked, the service responds with the following JSON. ``` functionName({ "root":"Something}); ``` 可讓開發人員指定要解譯為回呼參數之 URL 查詢字串參數的名稱。The allows developers to specify the name of the URL query string parameter to interpret as the callback parameter. 預設值是"callback"（不區分大小寫）。The default value is "callback" (not case sensitive). 下列範例會示範這個屬性如何套用到服務合約。The following example shows how this attribute is applied to a service contract. ``` [ServiceContract] [JavascriptCallbackBehavior] public class Service1 { [OperationContract] [WebGet(ResponseFormat=WebMessageFormat.Json)] public string GetData() { // ... } } ``` 這個屬性只適用於當標記服務合約型別，可搭配而繫結的屬性設定為`true`。This attribute only applies when it marks a service contract type that is used with the and the property of the binding is set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public JavascriptCallbackBehaviorAttribute ();

summary.span: 取得或設定用於跨網域指令碼存取的 URL 查詢字串參數名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL query string parameter name to use for cross-domain script access.

value.span: URL 查詢字串參數名稱。

span.span: The URL query string parameter name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性允許指定用來識別 JSONP 回呼參數名稱的 URL 查詢字串參數名稱。This property allows you to specify the name of the URL query string parameter used to identify the JSONP callback function name. 預設值是 「 回呼 」。The default value is "callback".
